title: The Mick
resume: Mackenzie "Mickey" Murphy is a hard-living, foul-mouthed, cigarette-smoking woman who moves to affluent Greenwich, CT to raise the spoiled kids of her wealthy sister who fled the country to avoid a federal indictment. She quickly learns what the rest of us already know - other people's children are awful.

View All Seasons Social Reviews  1 Discussions  17 c A review by chris  7.0 Written by  chris  on August 28, 2017 ok no this isn't a role model family or the perfect American family however this is one of the funniest tv comedies in recent memory micky herself isn't very family or kid friendly but shes working on it and the show is so heartwarming and funny you just cant resist it I suggest if you have a  mature family you give this one a chance you will like it Read All Reviews Media Most Popular Videos  1 Backdrops  10 Posters  6 Recommendations   2017-10-01 Ghosted 6.2    2017-09-26 Law & Order True Crime 6.1    2016-09-21 Speechless 7.5    2014-06-04 Jennifer Falls 3.2    2016-05-26 Neil Gaiman's Likely Stories 5.8    2015-11-30 Superstore 6.7    2017-02-07 Imposters 7.6    2017-07-24 Somewhere Between 5.9  Facts Status  Cancelled Network Certification TV-14 Meaning This program contains some material that many parents would find unsuitable for children under 14 years of age.
